  • Constructor Details

    • Chamber

      public Chamber(int h, int w)
      create a chamber
      Parameters:
      int - h is the height of the chamber
      int - w is the width of the chamber

  • Method Details

    • addParticle

      public void addParticle(String color, boolean isRed, int px, int py, int vx, int vy)
      Add particles to the chamber
      Parameters:
      String - color
      boolean - isRed
      int - px - position in x of the particle
      int - py - position in y of the particle
      int - vx - velocity in x of the particle
      int - vy - velocity in y of the particle

    • delParticle

      public boolean delParticle(String color)
      deletes the particules depends of the color
      Parameters:
      String - color (depends of the color delete the particle (red-blue))

    • addDemon

      public boolean addDemon(int d)
      if the position is no repeated creates a new demon in d
      Parameters:
      int - d - is the position in y-axis this number cannot be negative and cant be in the same position of the another demon.

    • delDemon

      public boolean delDemon(int d)
      deletes the demon in the position d
      Parameters:
      int - d - is the position in y-axis this number cannot be negative.

    • addHole

      public boolean addHole(int px, int py, int particles)
      add hole in a certain position return if its possible to add
      Parameters:
      int - px - position in x of the particle.
      int - py - position in y of the particle.
      int - particles - amount of particles.

    • demons

      public ArrayList<Integer> demons()
      return the array list of integers in order of lowest to highest

    • getParticules

      public ArrayList<Particle> getParticules()
      return the total amount of the particles

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
      change size of the chamber
      Parameters:
      int - newHeight - this number cannot be negative.
      int - newWidth - this number cannot be negative.

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      make visible everything in the chamber

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      make invisible everything in the chamber

    • sizeOf

      public int sizeOf()
      return the amount of demons in the maxwell container

    • getCenter

      public ArrayList<Integer> getCenter()
      return the center XY of the chamber

    • showCenter

      public void showCenter()
      show the center of the chamber

    • movement

      public void movement(Particle p)
      makes the movement of a certain particle
      Parameters:
      Particle - p

    • getParticlesInfo

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> getParticlesInfo()
      return the array list of the particles with a certain information (px,py,vx,vy) px is the position in x-axis of the particle py is the position in y-axis of the particle vx is the velocity in x-axis of the particle vy is the velocity in y-axis of the particle

    • getHolesInfo

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> getHolesInfo()
      return the matrix of holes with a specific information (px, py, particles) px is the position in x-axis of the particle py is the position in y-axis of the particle particles -> amount of particles that can hold the hole.

    • getIsVisible

      public boolean getIsVisible()
      return if the chamber is visible or not
